About Tracks

Authentic Video Conversations

Making Conversation Better

Tracks makes video messaging more like talking face-to-face. By capturing your authentic reaction and response each time you open a video, Tracks enables continuous, face-to-face conversations—on your time.

Our Story

Tracks began as an idea on a napkin (actually though). After a few months working nights and weekends, cofounders Evan, Rey, and Seth, began full time in spring 2015. Now Tracks is an angel-backed team of five, working from Miami Beach, Florida.

None of this would be possible without our amazing investors, advisors and employees. Learn more about the team, and our funding: Crunchbase, AngelList.

Want to work with us?
